section.title: EclipseLink
section.para: Download the "EclipseLink Installer Zip" implementation from the EclipseLink Download Site .

The download contains several jars. We need the following jars:
eclipselink.jar
javax.persistence_*.jar

section.title: Derby Database
section.para: The example later will be using Apache Derby as a database. Download Derby from http://db.apache.org/derby/ From this tutorial we will need the "derby.jar". For details on Derby (which is not required for this tutorial) please see Apache Derby .
